mapper.select: select count(1) from bsusqx where F_ID = #{qxid}

select ROLE.ROLE_ID,ROLE.ROLE_NAME,ROLE.F_JS,ROLE.F_MX,ROLE.F_PARENT,ROLE.F_NOTE from BSROLE ROLE where NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM BSUSROLE GX WHERE ROLE.ROLE_ID = GX.ROLE_ID AND GX.USER_ID = #{USER_ID} ) order by ROLE.ROLE_ID ;
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM BSUSROLE WHERE USER_ID = #{USER_ID} AND ROLE_ID = #{ROLE_ID}
mapper.select: SELECT menu.MENU_BH, menu.MENU_MC, menu.MODULE_BH, menu.APP_ID, menu.F_JS, menu.F_MX, menu.F_PARENT, menu.F_DISP, menu.URL, menu.IMAGE, menu.SHORTCUT, menu.F_CRDATE, menu.F_CHDATE FROM SYS_MENU menu WHERE APP_ID = #{APP_ID} ORDER BY menu.MENU_BH

SELECT menu.MENU_BH, menu.MENU_MC, menu.MODULE_BH, menu.APP_ID, menu.F_JS, menu.F_MX, menu.F_PARENT, menu.F_DISP, menu.URL, menu.IMAGE, menu.SHORTCUT, menu.F_CRDATE, menu.F_CHDATE, bsusqx.F_OP FROM SYS_MENU menu LEFT JOIN bsusqx ON menu.MENU_BH=bsusqx.ACCESS_VALUE AND bsusqx.F_OP = '1' AND bsusqx.MASTER_VALUE = #{USER_ID} AND bsusqx.F_ACCESS = #{YWXT_ID}+'MENU' AND bsusqx.F_MASTER ='USER' WHERE menu.F_JS = #{JS}+1 AND menu.MENU_BH LIKE #{MENU_BH} '%' ORDER BY menu.MENU_BH

SELECT menu.MENU_BH, menu.MENU_MC, menu.MODULE_BH, menu.APP_ID, menu.F_JS, menu.F_MX, menu.F_PARENT, menu.F_DISP, menu.URL, menu.IMAGE, menu.SHORTCUT, menu.F_CRDATE, menu.F_CHDATE, bsusqx.F_OP FROM SYS_MENU menu LEFT JOIN bsusqx ON menu.MENU_BH=bsusqx.ACCESS_VALUE AND bsusqx.F_OP = '1' AND bsusqx.MASTER_VALUE = #{ROLE_ID} AND bsusqx.F_ACCESS = #{YWXT_ID}+'MENU' AND bsusqx.F_MASTER ='ROLE' WHERE menu.F_JS = #{JS}+1 AND menu.MENU_BH LIKE #{MENU_BH} '%' ORDER BY menu.MENU_BH
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO bsusqx ( bsusqx.F_ID, bsusqx.F_MASTER, bsusqx.MASTER_VALUE, bsusqx.F_ACCESS, bsusqx.ACCESS_VALUE, bsusqx.F_OP ) VALUES ( #{F_ID} , #{F_MASTER}, #{MASTER_VALUE}, #{F_ACCESS}, #{ACCESS_VALUE}, #{F_OP} )
